scripts.build: (cd submodules/kiosk && yarn install && yarn build) && yarn trash build/server/public/kiosk && mkdir -p build/server/public && mv -fv submodules/kiosk/dist build/server/public/kiosk && (cd build/server && rbenv exec bundle install)
scripts.serve: cd build/server && rbenv exec bundle exec rackup -p 5101
